page.title: Duce Staley Makes Big Impact on Steelers (AP)
page.text: AP - For the first time in years, Duce Staley didn't mind being pulled from a game. As Steelers fans chanted, "Duce, Duce, Duce" during his third consecutive 100-yard game Sunday, Staley sat down late in the third quarter of Pittsburgh's 34-23 victory over Cleveland and never returned.
